QuestData.Title: Retribution for the Light
QuestData.Description: There are agents of darkness everywhere, fighting tooth and nail to envelop the world. The Light relies on us to balance the scale.$B$BYou have the power needed to destroy Teron'gor's demonic minions once and for all. Send them to the Twisting Nether in pieces!
QuestData.RewardText: Already I can feel the Light triumphing over darkness. We've done it!
